article_title: Vacationing man gets 12 calls from people trying to enroll him in Covered California – twitchy.com

twitter.title: Vacationing man gets 12 calls from people trying to enroll him in Covered California - twitchy.com

article_summary:
11 calls today — Leon Fairley (@LeonF63) April 7, 2015@CoveredCA 12 calls in 5 3/4 hours.
#fb — Leon Fairley (@LeonF63) April 7, 2015To paraphrase Covered California: “most likely this was a mistake.”
Unfortunately, his vacation keeps getting interrupted by phone calls from people trying to enroll him in Covered California (California’s Obamacare health insurance exchange).
— Leon Fairley (@LeonF63) April 7, 2015@CoveredCA I have never indicated interested in coverage through program.
#fb — Leon Fairley (@LeonF63) April 7, 2015A reasonable request, one would think.
